captions.text:
00:06
COMM: Lions are supposed to be kings of the

jungle, but no-one told this plucky little
mongoose, who dramatically took on these four
lions and escaped with his life.

came across the pride in the Masaai Mara National
Park, it looked like it was all over for the

00:25
COMM: But it soon becomes apparent that this

mongoose has no intention of becoming a lion’s
lunch.

00:33
COMM: After screaming and shouting at the

predators, the brave mongoose actually attacks
one the lions.

00:40
COMM: This surprise created by this attack

buys the mongoose enough time to escape to
a nearby hole in the ground.

00:48
COMM: But rather than staying safely beneath

the surface, he re-emerged, even more determined
to take the fight to the lions.

00:57
COMM: Stunning them with its ferocity, the

mongoose easily outruns the bewildered lions
and lives to fight another day.

title: Lion Vs Mongoose: Mongoose Fends Off Four Lions

comments.text:
Lion Vs Mongoose: Mongoose Fends Off Four Lions
A mongoose in the Masaai Mara National Park in Kenya lived could be the 
worst day of his life when four lions and tried to attack the cornered. But 
this little animal, recognized for having a temper and courage, refused to 
become lunch felines and decided to confront them. Determining the mongoose 
to fend off the attacks resulted in an almost heroic ending.

I don't get it, they go crazy with hyaenas. But with the mongoose way 
smaller then the hyaenas, they don't do nothing. ﻿

#animallovers   #animalfighting #mongoose #lion #amazingvideo #masaaimara   
#nationalpark #fighting  ﻿
